editable.desc: Allow editing of geometries? Default: false.

mousePos.desc: Display a special marker for this given position. Example: {latLon: [36.73, -121.9], radius: 5}

warning.desc: Emitted to notify of some warning.

addEntry.desc: Adds an entry to the map

entry.desc: Entry to be added. Must have an `entry_id` attribute to uniquely identify the entry.

removeEntry.desc: Removes an entry from the map

entry_id.desc: ID of the entry to be removed.

editEntry.desc: Starts editing mode for the given entry

entry_id.desc: ID of the entry to be esited.
